name: it's all balls
description:
You’ve got 20 seconds - just get rid of all the balls.

Created for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2021

How to play:
Move with the keyboard (A, D or arrow keys ) or a controller
Easiest to play with auto fire turned on but it can turned off for manual firing keyboard (space, shift, control or alt) or controller (A button)
